attributes.action: Passengers arriving in the UK must be  tested before boarding flights.
attributes.additional_details: To protect the UK public against further spread of Covid 19 Virus.
attributes.background: Arriving Passengers into the UK must have negative PCR test maximum 72 hours prior to Arrival. Passengers arriving by Air / Sea must produce a negative PCR test before boarding any Aircraft / Ship orr deny boarding. This will assist in the spread of the virus being dramatically reduced.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced mandatory COVID-19 testing for international arrivals to England: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/mandatory-covid-19-testing-introduced-to-bolster-border-measures
